channel.title: Summa Physica on
channel.description: Recent content in Summa Physica on

item.title: First Law of Thermodynamics
item.description: This is a statement of the conservation of energy, which can be summarised by the equation $$ \dd{U} = \bar{\dd}Q + \bar{\dd}{W} ,, $$ where $\bar{\dd}$ represents an inexact differential, $U$ is the internal energy, $Q$ is head, and $W$ is work done on the system.

item.title: Binary Encoding
item.description: Binary values $\vb{x}$ can be encoded into a [[qubit]] bit by bit $$ \ket{\vb{x}} = \bigotimes_{i=0}^{m} \ket{x_i} ,, $$ where $x_i$ are the bits for the binary value $\vb{x} = (x_0, x_1, x_2, \dots, x_m)$.
